trans-unit.source: Provides methods to place data on and retrieve data from the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法以将数据置于并从系统剪贴板中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined formats to use with the Clipboard class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用剪贴板类的预定义格式的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A> to put data on the Clipboard, replacing its current contents.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A>以将数据放在剪贴板上，取代其当前的内容。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: To place a persistent copy of the data on the Clipboard, set the `copy` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要将持久数据的副本放在剪贴板上，设置`copy`参数`true`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class or an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要将数据放到剪贴板上多个格式中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>实现。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: 将数据放置在剪贴板中多种格式，以最大化目标应用程序，你可能不知道，其格式要求可以成功检索数据的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A> to retrieve data from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A>从剪贴板检索数据。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data is returned as an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 为实现的对象返回的数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>

trans-unit.source: Use the methods specified by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> and fields in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> to extract the data from the object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>和字段中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>从对象中提取数据。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>

trans-unit.source: If you do not know the format of the data you retrieved, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface to get a list of all formats that data is stored in.
trans-unit.target: 如果不知道你检索的数据格式，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>接口来获取该数据的所有格式的列表所存储</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>的方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface, and specify a format that your application can use.
trans-unit.target: 然后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>接口，并指定你的应用程序可以使用的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the Clipboard class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，剪贴板类提供了其他方法，它可以更轻松地使用系统剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.Clear%2A> method to remove all data from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.Clear%2A>方法从剪贴板中删除所有数据。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add data of a particular format to the Clipboard, replacing the existing data, call the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A>, or call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetData%2A> method to specify the format.
trans-unit.target: 若要将特定的格式的数据添加到剪贴板，替换现有数据，调用相应`Set`*格式*方法，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A>，或调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetData%2A>方法来指定格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetData%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data of a particular format from the Clipboard, first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A>) method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format, and then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A>) to retrieve the data if the Clipboard contains it.
trans-unit.target: 若要从剪贴板中检索特定格式的数据，请先调用相应`Contains`*格式*方法 (如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A>) 方法来确定剪贴板是否包含中的数据，设置的格式，，然后调用相应`Get`*格式*方法 (如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A>) 来检索数据，如果剪贴板包含它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the format in these operations, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsData%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要在这些操作中指定的格式，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsData%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A>方法相反。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsData%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All Windows-based applications share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 基于所有 Windows 的应用程序共享系统剪贴板，因此内容可能会发生更改时切换到另一个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: > > An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: >> 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a non-serializable object to a Clipboard method, the method will fail without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果将非可序列化对象传递给剪贴板方法时，该方法将失败而不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization> for more information on serialization.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>有关序列化的详细信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>

trans-unit.source: If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标应用程序需要一种非常具体的数据格式，标头添加到序列化过程中的数据可能会阻止应用程序不能识别你的数据。

trans-unit.source: To preserve your data format, add your data as a <xref:System.Byte> array to a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> and pass the <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留数据格式，请添加你的数据作为<xref:System.Byte>数组到<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>并将传递<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A> </xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> </xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> </xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: > > The Clipboard class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: >> 剪贴板类仅可在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法标记为<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>属性。</xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > > Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: >> 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特殊注意事项。

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format.
trans-unit.target: 由于在当前实现中的限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别类，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs).
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅文章 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"http://support.microsoft.com 在 Microsoft 知识库。

trans-unit.source: Removes all data from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 从剪贴板中删除所有数据。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard is shared by multiple processes, calling this method may have an impact on those processes.
trans-unit.target: 由于剪贴板可由多个进程共享的则调用此方法可能会对这些进程的影响。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类仅在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法标记为<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>属性。</xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard could not be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 无法清除剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 另一个进程正在使用剪贴板时通常会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 当前线程未处于单线程单元 (STA) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> to your application's <xref uid="langword_csharp_Main" name="Main" href=""></xref> method.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>到你的应用程序<xref uid="langword_csharp_Main" name="Main" href=""></xref>方法。</xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>

trans-unit.target: 指示在剪贴板上是否存在数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio"></xref>格式。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains audio data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetAudioStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定是否剪贴板中检索之前包含音频数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetAudioStream%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.target: 指示指定的格式或可以转换为该格式到剪贴板上是否存在数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class contains pre-defined format names that you can use with this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>类包含可以使用此方法使用的预定义的格式名。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified format or a compatible format before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定剪贴板中是否包含指定的格式或兼容的格式中的数据检索之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 数据可以转换为另一种格式，如果它已存储指定允许转换，并且请求的格式是与存储格式兼容。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。

trans-unit.source: This method checks for the presence of data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat> format on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/add/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/add/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then places nonpersistent data on it.
trans-unit.target: 清除剪贴板，并在其上将非持久性数据。

trans-unit.source: Data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序退出时，数据将从系统剪贴板中删除。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> if all attempts are unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 此方法尝试在 100 毫秒的时间间隔，十倍中设置数据，则引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>如果所有尝试都均失败。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果将非可序列化对象传递给此方法时，它将失败而不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization> for more information on serialization.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>有关序列化的详细信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then places data on it and specifies whether the data should remain after the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 清除剪贴板，然后将数据置于它并指定在应用程序退出后是否保留数据。

trans-unit.source: If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 如果`copy`参数是`false`，将从系统剪贴板中的应用程序退出时删除数据。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> if all attempts are unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 此方法尝试在 100 毫秒的时间间隔，十倍中设置数据，则引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>如果所有尝试都均失败。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then attempts to place data on it the specified number of times and with the specified delay between attempts, optionally leaving the data on the Clipboard after the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 清除剪贴板，然后尝试在其上指定的数目的次数和与指定尝试的时间间隔，（可选） 将数据保留在剪贴板在应用程序退出后放置数据。

trans-unit.source: Adding data to the Clipboard can occasionally fail if the Clipboard is busy with another thread or application.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪贴板正忙于处理另一个线程或应用程序，可以偶尔也会失败将数据添加到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to work around this issue in environments with heavy Clipboard use.
trans-unit.target: 此方法很有用，若要解决此问题的大量使用剪贴板的环境。

trans-unit.source: If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 如果`copy`参数是`false`，将从系统剪贴板中的应用程序退出时删除数据。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception.

trans-unit.target: 清除剪贴板，然后添加集合中的文件名<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop"></xref>格式。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.
trans-unit.target: 文件下拉列表是一个包含文件的路径信息的字符串集合。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is stored on the Clipboard as a <xref:System.String> array.
trans-unit.target: 文件放置列表存储在剪贴板上<xref:System.String>数组。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method converts `filePaths` to a <xref:System.String> array before adding it to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将转换`filePaths`到<xref:System.String>之前将其添加到剪贴板的数组。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a file drop list from the Clipboard, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList%2A> method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetFileDropList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从剪贴板中检索文件下拉列表，请先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList%2A>方法来确定剪贴板是否包含该格式的数据检索之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetFileDropList%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetFileDropList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类仅在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法标记为<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>属性。</xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>
